oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Challenges of Participatory Plant Breeding
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Messmer, Monika
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: FiBL Plant breeding strategies - Why participatory plant breeding ? - Level of participation - Principles of participatory research - Challenges of participatory plant breeding - Who to get started - Communication / Common language - Definition of common goals - Long term engagement & Gender aspect - Implementation of PPB & Struggle with on farm trials - Data assessment & sample handling - Legal aspects and financing - Impact of participative plant breeding
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Messmer, Monika (2012) Challenges of Participatory Plant Breeding. Paper at: NUE Crops Workshop, Crete, Greece, 9. - 10. June 2012. [Submitted]
